Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Nitrofurantoin
MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully automated short-term incubation cycle antimicrobial susceptibility system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with nitrofurantoin for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of enterococci and staphylococci.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci, specifically for nitrofurantoin.
